title: Designing Engagement Strategies for Quiet Learners in Veterinary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational veterinary science theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing small-group collaboration and interaction via real-time polling tools (e.g., Mentimeter) in VR simulation-based clinical case analysis environments.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% participation rates by analyzing complex clinical cases through small-group discussions in VR simulation environments
Learners engage in real-time responses at least three times per class using digital polling tools
Learners actively listen to peer feedback and provide five or more constructive comments via a peer feedback system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
